author: Jim Carlton
title: Gunman Kills Three Hostages at California Veterans Home
text:
SAN FRANCISCO—An armed standoff Friday at a veterans home in Yountville, Calif. ended with the discovery of four bodies by police, including the suspected gunman and his three hostages, authorities said.
Police tactical teams made the discovery at about 6 p.m. Friday, hours after the gunman stormed into a building on the campus of the Veterans Home of California, a state-operated facility in the heart of Napa Valley wine country and began taking hostages at about 10:30 a.m. A Napa County sheriff’s deputy responding to the...
